author: cnbc.com
title: Energy Recovery misses 4Q revenue forecasts
text:
SAN LEANDRO, Calif. (AP) _ Energy Recovery Inc. (ERII) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $11.6 million.
On a per-share basis, the San Leandro, California-based company said it had net income of 21 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were 6 cents per share.
The maker of energy recovery devices posted revenue of $22.4 million in the period, which missed Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $26 million.
For the year, the company reported profit of $12.4 million, or 22 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $63.2 million.
Energy Recovery shares have declined 21 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $6.89, a drop of 21 percent in the last 12 months.
